metadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.18+commit.87f61d96"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[],"devdoc":{"details":"https://gist.github.com/axic/5b33912c6f61ae6fd96d6c4a47afde6d Method for signing: // Using eth.sign() let accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); let msg = accounts[0]; // the owner address let msgHash1 = web3.utils.sha3(msg); let sig1 = await web3.eth.sign(msg, accounts[0]); // Using eth.accounts.sign() - returns an object let privateKey = \"0xc87509a1c067bbde78beb793e6fa76530b6382a4c0241e5e4a9ec0a0f44dc0d3\"; let accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); let msg = accounts[0]; // the owner address let sigObj = await web3.eth.accounts.sign(msg, privateKey) let msgHash2 = sigObj.messageHash; let sig2 = sigObj.signature;","kind":"dev","methods":{},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/libs/ECVerify.sol":"ECVerify"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":1},"remappings":[],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"project:/contracts/libs/ECVerify.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7a9d362ccc49715a3c3cc1de529df39f723b5b70f2eefd17f2f14d8139af381b","license":"CC-BY-4.0","urls":["bzz-raw://a48e0036fc134b9eb423f2c228097d780d122fa2f06210be1f252e52a5466493","dweb:/ipfs/Qmb9yVvUziQpVDFWUMcvbhpTpK9ZKtuDbLUoS2bcjzKcZG"]}},"version":1}

devdoc.details: https://gist.github.com/axic/5b33912c6f61ae6fd96d6c4a47afde6d Method for signing: // Using eth.sign() let accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); let msg = accounts[0]; // the owner address let msgHash1 = web3.utils.sha3(msg); let sig1 = await web3.eth.sign(msg, accounts[0]); // Using eth.accounts.sign() - returns an object let privateKey = "0xc87509a1c067bbde78beb793e6fa76530b6382a4c0241e5e4a9ec0a0f44dc0d3"; let accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); let msg = accounts[0]; // the owner address let sigObj = await web3.eth.accounts.sign(msg, privateKey) let msgHash2 = sigObj.messageHash; let sig2 = sigObj.signature;
